epic.name: Develop and release hyperloop sample apps
epic.summary: Hyperloop: Develop and release sample apps

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h4. Description
We need to enhance our sample app offerings. Hyperloop has specifically been requested.

Creating a cross-platform hyperloop sample will help with this effort.
fields.summary: Create hyperloop sample app for inclusion on the Studio dashboard

comments.body: We should link the existing (https://github.com/appcelerator/hyperloop-examples) one that includes 40+ examples already into Studio. Same for the kitchensink-v2, our machine learning PlexusRX app and other demos like drag and drop.
